solution_line_template: Every tray needs {cookies_per_tray} cookies and she's making {num_trays} trays so {cookies_per_tray}*{num_trays} = <<{cookies_per_tray}*{num_trays}={total_cookies_needed}>>{total_cookies_needed}

Every box of cookies has {cookies_per_box} cookies. She needs {total_cookies_needed} cookies so {total_cookies_needed}/{cookies_per_box} = <<{total_cookies_needed}/{cookies_per_box}={num_boxes_needed}>>{num_boxes_needed} boxes
The boxes cost ${cost_per_box} each and she needs {num_boxes_needed} boxes so {cost_per_box}*{num_boxes_needed} = $<<{cost_per_box}*{num_boxes_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
